_comment: Configuration Instructions: Replace the account_id and api_token above with your actual credentials

_instructions.1: Log in to Cloudflare Dashboard: https://dash.cloudflare.com/
_instructions.2: Go to My Profile > API Tokens
_instructions.3: Create a Token with Browser Rendering permissions
_instructions.4: Fill in the Account ID and API Token in the fields above
_instructions.5: Save this file as config.json (do not commit to version control)

default_prompts.products: Extract all product information including name, price, description, and image URLs
default_prompts.articles: Extract article title, author, publish date, and main content
default_prompts.contact: Extract contact information including email, phone, address
